name: boox-sync
description: Automatically import Boox NeoReader highlights and handwritten notes into Obsidian, formatted with citation styles and metadata enrichment.
author: Muhammad Saadiq

scripts.deploy: npm run build && mkdir -p /Users/muhammad_saadiq/Documents/@L-P/Obsidian/ArRahman/.obsidian/plugins/boox-sync && cp main.js manifest.json /Users/muhammad_saadiq/Documents/@L-P/Obsidian/ArRahman/.obsidian/plugins/boox-sync/
